ygData.subject: Re: Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, their AE stuns will not wake mesmerized mobs.  They can use them while doing crowd control.  Mind you, the mobs won t like the enchanter very
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 9 Feb 2000, Olivier Schmitt wrote:
>
> The scintillating colors refers to the color shift line of
> spells, an AoE (maybe point blank but not sure) stun
> effect. Enchanters really shine in the mob control
> department, but on single pulls can do very well : tashan
> mob, then slow it or stun it repeatedly.

Actually, their AE stuns will not wake mesmerized mobs. They
can use them while doing crowd control. Mind you, the mobs
won't like the enchanter very much afterwards.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
